Appetizers.name: Observability Onion Rings
Appetizers.description: Crispy, golden-fried onion rings. You can see every metric of flavor.

Appetizers.name: SRE-viche
Appetizers.description: A reliable and highly available citrus-cured fish appetizer with avocado and cilantro.

Appetizers.name: Containerized Calamari
Appetizers.description: Lightly breaded and fried calamari, served with a zesty marinara sauce.

Main Courses.name: Cloud-Native Burger
Main Courses.description: A delicious 1/2 lb burger with cheddar, lettuce, and tomato, served with a side of containerized fries.

Main Courses.name: Kubernetes Kebab
Main Courses.description: Perfectly orchestrated and scalable skewers of marinated chicken and vegetables.

Main Courses.name: Serverless Salmon
Main Courses.description: Pan-seared salmon with a lemon-dill sauce, served on-demand with asparagus.

Main Courses.name: Firewall Fajitas
Main Courses.description: Sizzling hot plate of grilled steak or chicken with peppers and onions, secured with warm tortillas.

Desserts.name: Terraform Tiramisu
Desserts.description: A layered dessert, provisioned perfectly every time with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

Desserts.name: Dockerized Doughnuts
Desserts.description: A trio of isolated, light, and fluffy doughnuts with various glazes.

Beverages.name: API-Gria
Beverages.description: A refreshing red wine punch, a perfect interface for a warm evening.

Beverages.name: Lambda Lemonade
Beverages.description: Freshly squeezed lemonade, a serverless function for quenching thirst.
